title: Inting player - [REMOVED] - never gets punished.
body:
So this player- [REMOVED] - Started her game out like any other, Then all of a sudden, started running down mid. repeatedly intentionally feeding boasting about how " It's Oceania i guarantee you i won't get a penalty for this". What kind of messed up system allows players like this to continue to play the game?

There needs to be a better system in place to prevent players being able to intentionally feed and continue to queue up and play again! its ridiculous!

TIME TO TAKE ACTION RIOT.
(pics of proof in links.)

[REMOVED]

[Please refer to the Universal Rule regarding ["Reporting Other Players"](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/BjArMH2B-boards-universal-rules)]

replies.body: Do you think the image is doctored?
What does that have to do with anything?
So it wouldn't be a false positive.
We don't remove names just for the chance they are false positives. Among other things it's to prevent witch-hunting.
